name: Cusco - Machupicchu
description: Cusco often spelled Cuzco (Spanish: Cuzco )  is a city in southeastern Peru, near the Urubamba Valley of the  Andes mountain range. It is the capital of the Cusco Region The site was the historic capital of the Inca Empire from the 13th until the 16th century Spanish conquest. In 1983 Cusco was declared a World Heritage Site by UNESCO
